attributes.title: Just terrible
attributes.review: It did not allow me as an African American to send feedback what so ever. Always glitches out and I believe they are stealing my money also

attributes.title: Just Don’t😪🧚🏽‍♀️✨
attributes.review: Awful app! I opened the app and saw an orange man that is racist, a rapist, transphobic, homophobic, xenophobic, etc. Would not recommend getting this app! Wish I could give it less than 1 star :/

attributes.title: I want my hot cheetos app!!!
attributes.review: I was looking for a hot cheetos app🥵 but this popped up🙅‍♀️THIS IS FALSE ADVERTISEMENT AND FAKE NEWS!!! 😡This should have never happened, this should be A1 felony!🧟‍♂️ I WANT CHEETOS APP NOT THIS!! ❌N E ways it’s time to take my fish 🐠 for a walk  and don’t forget to stan Blackpink and Exo for clear skin 🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible. I’m disgusted.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and a rat appeared in my room and called me ISIS because I’m Muslim 😓 as soon as I deleted the app the rat disappeared as well. Don’t recommend unless you want a disgusting rat to appear!

attributes.title: Awful, awful app
attributes.review: Awful app. It turned my phone into an orange, tiny-handed Decepticon that wouldn’t stop shouting about walls which just ruined my day. I plan to uninstall immediately

attributes.title: Instructions Unclear (Allergic Reaction)
attributes.review: This app was very rude. I saw oranges everywhere and I am allergic to oranges so you can see my problem. Should’ve been a warning for showing graphic images. 👁💧👄💧👁

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: immediately when I open the app it was glitching and horrible and even my other apps are glitchy now from it and I just don’t like that so NO❤️

attributes.title: I WOULD GIVE IT 0 STARS IF I COULD ☹︎
attributes.review: I downloded this app to get information and also updates about the 2020 presidents campaign, and this app is trash because my ipad has been acticg up ever since, PLUS ther are glitches. THIS IS A HORRIBLE APP!!! DO NOT GET IT PLEASE!!!

attributes.title: This App has Made America Garbage Again
attributes.review:
Dear President Trump,
You disgust me! And almost my entire generation! 🧚🏼🧚🏼💫⭐️✨but dont worry, Ill still take you out sometime on a hot date 💫🧚🏼😍💞⭐️ to the garbage disposal 💫💞💫🧚🏼maybe even a cozy jail cell

attributes.title: Don’t do it 😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this and it glitched so hard my phone cracked. It’s not to the touch so I can only use a stylus and the screen shrunk so it’s only in an itty bitty corner. Don’t do it, it’s not worth it
